about.title: About Travel-Rizz
about.intro: Travel-Rizz began with a simple truth: everyone deserves to experience the joy of a well-planned journey, regardless of their planning expertise. Through years of helping friends and family plan their trips, I saw how overwhelming the process could be.
about.experience: That's why I created Travel-Rizz - to empower travelers with the right tools and knowledge. Whether you're exploring bustling cities or seeking quiet adventures, having a helpful companion in your planning journey makes all the difference.
about.mission: By combining personal travel insights with thoughtful technology, we aim to make trip planning feel like having a conversation with a knowledgeable friend who's genuinely excited to help shape your perfect journey.

features.title: How We Help You Plan Better

aiChat.title: Natural Travel Conversations
aiChat.description: Share your travel ideas as you would with a friend. Together, we'll explore possibilities and create plans that reflect your personal style.

insights.title: Timely Travel Knowledge
insights.description: Access helpful insights about your destination - from weather patterns to local customs - exactly when you need them.

routes.title: Visual Journey Planning
routes.description: See your daily adventures laid out on interactive maps. Understand your routes and make adjustments until they feel just right.

itinerary.title: Flexible Day Planning
itinerary.description: Build your days with intuitive tools that let you organize activities your way. Easily adjust as your plans evolve.

hero.title: Plan Your Perfect Journey, Your Way
hero.subtitle: No more overwhelming research across multiple sites. Have a natural conversation about your travel dreams, and we'll help you turn them into reality - one thoughtful detail at a time.

pricing.title: Simple, Clear Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Focus on what matters - planning your perfect trip - with straightforward pricing that respects your journey.

footer.tagline: Plan Your Perfect Journey, Your Way
